Package LAB_03

Class ShlupkaAbs

java.lang.Object
LAB_03.ShlupkaAbs
Direct Known Subclasses:
motorBoat
public abstract class ShlupkaAbs extends Object
Abstract class ShlupkaAbs models a rowing boat with oars, hull, and seats. It allows managing passengers, boat movement, and logs all actions to a file.

  • Constructor Details

    • ShlupkaAbs

      public ShlupkaAbs() throws FileNotFoundException
      Default constructor. Creates a boat with default configuration: 2 oars, wooden hull 6x2 meters, 6 seats, log file "Log.txt".
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the log file cannot be created

    • ShlupkaAbs

      public ShlupkaAbs(int countOars, String material, double length, double width, int countSeats, String nameFile) throws FileNotFoundException
      Constructor with parameters to create a boat with specific configuration.
      Parameters:
      countOars - number of oars
      material - hull material
      length - hull length in meters
      width - hull width in meters
      countSeats - number of seats
      nameFile - name of the log file
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the log file cannot be created
